### Infrastructure

versions.body:
### Added
- [WEB-2096](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2096) DAI OSD
- [WEB-2314](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2314) External shop menu entry

### Changed
- [WEB-2241](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2241) Switch to fullscreen on rotation to landscape
- [WEB-2316](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2316) Assume user is favored over authenticated user
- [WEB-2319](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2319) Player progress bar improvement
- [WEB-2320](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2319) `Upgrade` icon in menu
- Adjusted AdBlocker detection
- The amount of requested teasers in a teaser collection was increased to `25`
- Updated `@zatto/web-config` to `14.2.0`
- Not supported browsers are detected based on missing APIs
- Prevented continuous clicking on teasers

### Removed
- [WEB-2348](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2348) External VOD link feature

### Fixed
- [WEB-2326](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2326) App crashes if URL contains `%`
- [WEB-2317](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2317) Can't exit fullscreen after one ad replaces another
- [WEB-2352](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2352) Excessive updates of a recording's position
- [WEB-2214](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2214) Progress bar doesn't reach edges on drag
- [WEB-2355](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2355) Race condition in play/pause requests upon switching to the next replay stream
- [WEB-2366](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2366) VOD Purchase screen is not completely gone after purchasal
- Carousels on an editorial page were re-rendering whenever player would enter the Split view
- A relatively rare case when Cast SDK wasn't available
- Minor issues with MediaSession

### Infrastructure
- [WEB-2294](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2294) Issue Tracking
- [WEB-2324](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2324) Added Mnet tenant to `evergreen` pipeline
- [WEB-1835](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-1835) `@zattoo/editorial` was brought back
- [WEB-2321](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2321) Profile feature moved to common
- [WEB-2318](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2318) Removed override config of VOD for Salt
- [WEB-2354](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2354) Move measurement as standalone feature
- [WEB-2224](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2224) Replace string enums with constants
- [WEB-2320](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2319) `upsell` renamed to `upgrade`
- Added missing "beaker" cookie report
- Updated `@zattoo/zapi` to `v3.2.1`
- Thunk action annotations replaced with `thunk` utility
- Removed clearing of an obsolete SW cache
- Google Analytics was extended with a project's version
- Error tracking is initialized at the very start of the application

### Fixed
- [WEB-2350](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/WEB-2350) Google IMA error which prevented a stream from being resumed after a blocked autoplay
- Added back previous mechanism of AdBlocker detection

### Infrastructure
- Prevented duplication of Sentry error events
- Established grouping of ZAPI error events
- ResizeObserver loop error event won't be reported to Sentry

- irrelevant updates of the lineup state which led to a missing program information

  - Scrolling to element

- [ZRW-674](https://zattoo2.atlassian.net/browse/ZRW-674) Blocked textarea key events

### Infrastructure
- update @zattoo/hyperion-core
- e2e tests for main menu
- migrated to the legacy decorators proposal
- added Monaco bogus app tid
- disable the `TryCatch` Sentry integration
- update React dependencies

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
